channel.title: CVE Feed for Enbra -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Enbra -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-34572|2024-09-16T17:23:17.590Z -- enbra -- ewm%201.7.29
item.description: Enbra EWM 1.7.29 does not check for or detect replay attacks sent by wireless M-Bus Security mode 5 devices. Instead timestamps of the sensor are replaced by the time of the readout even if the data is a replay of earlier data.

item.title: CVE-2021-34571|2024-09-16T16:13:55.210Z -- enbra -- at-wmbus-16-2
item.description: Multiple Wireless M-Bus devices by Enbra use Hard-coded Credentials in Security mode 5 without an option to change the encryption key. An adversary can learn all information that is available in Enbra EWM.
